text: Ezɨ gumazamiziba akar kam baregha bar a gifonge. Egha me Stiven amɨsefe, a gumazir bar nɨghnɨzir gavgavim itim, ezɨ Godɨn Duam bar a gizɨfa. Egha me uaghan Filip, ko Prokorus, ko Nikanor, ko Timon, Parmenas, ko Nikolas me amɨsefe. Nikolas an Antioghɨn gumazim, a Judan gumazim puvatɨ, a faragha Judan Arazibagh amuava dar gɨn zui. Egha a datɨrɨghɨn Kraisɨn gɨn zui.
